channel.title: I need help
channel.description:
1.) I need help to add an auto retaliate to my server. 2.) How do i remove shops from the quest tab. 3.) My client has a lot of items not accounted for like they are showing up as dots. [hr] 1.)
I need help with adding an auto re-taliate, i really need it. [hr] 2.) How do i remove shops from my quest tab. Look.
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/fypxzr.jpg[/img] [hr] I need to fix all these items.
Like
Skill capes, hoods, godswords and stuff they all come up like that. All of the new items like bandos, armadyl, skillcapes, skill hoods, anything with 5 numers and some other items [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/2njjxwn.png[/img]

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

[quote=“Reamm28, post:2, topic:349421”]Get a client to fix the nulls… ( Those items that show up as a big dot )

To fix Auto-retaliate use the search button since I think its been answered before.

To edit the shops from the skills tab
First go to client.java
second search for the shops like ( pure shop )
Third Erase its contents from } to the other }
Fourth Compile and re-run the server[/quote]
Thanks, would you know a nice client i can download?

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

Get a client to fix the nulls… ( Those items that show up as a big dot )

To fix Auto-retaliate use the search button since I think its been answered before.

To edit the shops from the skills tab
First go to client.java
second search for the shops like ( pure shop )
Third Erase its contents from } to the other }
Fourth Compile and re-run the server

Read full topic
